stimulusHtml: What is the relationship between the price of previously issued bonds and the prevailing market interest rate?
choicesHtml: The price of previously issued bonds is directly related to the prevailing market interest rate.
The price of previously issued bonds is unrelated to the prevailing market interest rate.
The price of previously issued bonds is inversely related to the prevailing market interest rate.
The price of previously issued bonds is equal to the prevailing market interest rate.
The price of previously issued bonds is less than the prevailing market interest rate.
